column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////I think what really irritated me was the closeness in proximity we were to 2 women who sat next to us immediately after we ordered. I felt so bad for the Â waitress. Basically kept complaining about a broth she got that "wasn't the same as the broth before
column2: and didn't realize it was a science when ordering ramen." My gawd
column3: too bad society frowns upon me being able to tell her to shut up! :) I'm sure the waitress would've appreciated that as well. Lol!
